short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CRM Integration powered by Cypress Connects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CRM integration is designed to enhance your communication and streamline your workflow. With seamless integration to your VoIP phone system, it offers powerful features such as:

•	Automatic Call Logging: Sync your inbound and outbound calls, including time, duration, and date, directly with Salesforce and other CRMs*.
•	Click-to-Call: Instantly dial any phone number found in your browser with just a click.
•	Automatic Screen Pops: Get instant access to over 70+ applications with automatic screen pops.
•	Call History Integration: Easily access your call history and seamlessly return calls.
•	Presence Integration: Stay updated with real-time presence information in your phone system directory.
•	Custom Speed Dial Directory: Create your personalized speed dial list for quicker access to frequent contacts.

The CRM integration allows you to make calls, receive CRM screen pops, and more, all within your web browser. With our pre-built CRM integrations and more added regularly, you can expect improved workflows and streamlined processes. Simply log in with your existing Cypress Connects portal account and get started in seconds!
